DOC.brief_summary: The aim current study pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic characterization single dose administration four dose FSH-GEX™ healthy pituitary-suppressed female volunteer , comparison two market comparator product .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female subject 1840 year age . 2 . Subjects must good health . 3 . Subjects must willing use additional nonhormonal contraception 4 . Subjects must use COC least one cycle . 5 . Vital sign within follow range baseline measurement : systolic blood pressure 90140 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure 5090 mmHg pulse rate 40 100 bpm . 6 . Subjects must body weight minmally 50.0 kg BMI 18.0 29.0 kg/m^2 baseline measurement . 7 . Able provide write informed consent prior study participation . 8 . Able communicate well investigator understand comply requirement study . 1 . Smokers 10 cigarette per day . 2 . Average daily intake 3 unit alcohol per day average weekly intake 21 unit alcohol . 3 . Use prescription drug OTC medication screen endofstudy visit , without prior approval investigator . 4 . Any drug thay may reduce effectiveness COC screen endofstudy visit . 5 . Any FSH preparation within 90 day prior screen . 6 . Administration investigational product use investigational device within 30 day prior screen . 7 . Donation loss 500 mL blood within 90 day prior first FSHGEX™ dosing . 8 . History acute chronic bronchospastic disease ( include asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , treat treat ) . 9 . History allergy drug , seafood , nut , egg , waspstings ; history atopic allergy ( asthma , urticaria , eczematous dermatitis ) . A known hypertensitivity study drug . 10 . Any surgical medical condition might alter absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug may jeopardize subject case participation study . 11 . History presence malignancy . 12 . Determined suspected pregnancy . 13 . Breast feeding woman . 14 . History ( current ) endocrine abnomalities . 15 . Contraindication use oral contraceptive . 16 . Contraindication use follitropin alfa , folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) excipients ( hypersensitivity follitropin alfa , FSH excipients ; tumor hypothalamus pituitary gland ; ovarian enlargement cyst due polycystic ovarian disease ; gynecological bleed unknown origin ; ovarian , uterine , mammary carcinoma ) . 17 . Porphyria family history porphyria . 18 . History ovarian surgery . 19 . Any ovarian abdominal abnormality would interfere adequate ultrasound investigation . 20 . An abnormal cervical smear . 21 . History presence immunecompromising disease , positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) test result past screen visit . 22 . History Hepatitis B C , positive Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C test result screen visit . 23 . History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior screen visit evidence abuse . 24 . Planned surgery hospitalization period study . 25 . Concurrent participation participation within 30 day screen another clinical trial , participation 3 clinical study within 12 month , prior expect date enrolment study . 26 . Injection one dose depot contraceptive drug /drug combination hormonal implant < = 10 month prior screen .
